title: Escapade
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Cinderella and the mob' by William Irish.
description: Agnes receives a phone call in which a man named Philippe gives her a rendez-vous. Thinking it is Philippe, her fiance, with whom she just had a fight who want to kiss and make-up, Agnes decides to meet him, even though she is grounded. When she arrives at the meeting place, she is welcomed by gangsters who ask her to mellow Frank, a gangster who double-crossed them.  Credits: Producer, Christine Gouze-Renal ; director, Ralph Habib ; writers, Albert Valentin, Marcel Achard ; photography, Pierre Petit ; music, Michel Emer ; art direction, Georges Wakhevitch ; assitant directors, Claude Pinoteau, Alain Jessua. Cast: Louis Jourdan, Dany Carrel, Roger Hanin, Margaret Hung, Jean Lec, Lise Delamare, Claude Genia.
